attributes.action: Full unlimited independent nationwide enquiry into child grooming gangs in uk
attributes.additional_details:
The UK population wants a full unlimited public enquiry into the historic and current child sexual exploitation grooming gangs scandal in the UK. This will allow survivors to get justice for crimes committed against them where they have been failed by the police and government over and over again 
This issue will not go away 
The UK wants the whole truth
attributes.background:
The British people want
The government to hold a full unlimited independent nationwide enquiry into historic and current Child sexual exploitation and child grooming gangs in the uk 
In order to protect children from all backgrounds and nationality’s.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
